code:
C4Context
  title JustNews - Storage, Archive & Dashboard
  Enterprise_Boundary(b0, "Storage & Analytics") {
    System(memory, "Memory", "Article ingestion, embeddings, vector store")
    System(archive, "Archive", "Long-term storage / Knowledge Graph")
    System(dashboard, "Dashboard", "Operations UI for editors & operators")
    System(analytics, "Analytics", "KPI aggregation & performance metrics")
  }

  Rel(memory, archive, "Sends archived content / indexes to archive")
  Rel(dashboard, analytics, "Reads aggregated KPIs & system metrics")
  Rel(analytics, memory, "Reads ingestion & processing metrics from memory")
  Rel(archive, memory, "Reads references for search & retrieval")

  UpdateElementStyle(memory, $bgColor="#F0FFF4", $borderColor="#27AE60")
  UpdateElementStyle(archive, $bgColor="#FFF9E6", $borderColor="#FFB703")
  UpdateElementStyle(dashboard, $bgColor="#F7F7FF", $borderColor="#A44CFF")
  UpdateElementStyle(analytics, $bgColor="#F7FBFF", $borderColor="#2D9CDB")

  UpdateRelStyle(memory, archive, $textColor="#333", $lineColor="#FFB703", $offsetX="10")
  UpdateRelStyle(analytics, memory, $textColor="#333", $lineColor="#2D9CDB", $offsetX="10")
  UpdateRelStyle(dashboard, analytics, $textColor="#333", $lineColor="#A44CFF", $offsetX="5")

  UpdateLayoutConfig($c4ShapeInRow="4", $c4BoundaryInRow="1")

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 b0, "Storage & Analytics" 和 memory, "Memory", "Article ingestion, embeddings, vector store" 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'b0, "Storage & Analytics" 和 memory, "Memory", "Article ingestion, embeddings, vector store"'，对吧？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 archive, "Archive", "Long-term storage / Knowledge Graph" 和 dashboard, "Dashboard", "Operations UI for editors & operators" 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'archive, "Archive", "Long-term storage / Knowledge Graph" 和 dashboard, "Dashboard", "Operations UI for editors & operators"'。
可以，继续吧。

明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'analytics, "Analytics", "KPI aggregation & performance metrics" 和 memory, archive, "Sends archived content / indexes to archive"'？
